title: I’ve Been Reincarnated into a Man Eating Flower ~Revenge~ ~Till the Day I Eat Him~ - Novel Updates
tags: Cold Protagonist   Cruel Characters   Depictions of Cruelty   Female Protagonist   Game Elements   Humanoid Protagonist   Level System   Reincarnation   Revenge
author: Maiky
description:
Because she was framed as one of the royal family’s killer, a innocent woman was burned to death.

After being reincarnated as man-eating flower, she now has been given a chance to get her revenge.

Planting  vegetation traps, eating humans, and seeking for revenge has now become her way of life!>
